Purpose: To provide consistent, reliable, and accurate immunohistochemical staining for Uroplakin II as a biomarker in the diagnosis of urothelial carcinoma.
Container: Positively charged glass slides with labeled FFPE tissue sections
Equipment: Automated IHC stainer (e.g., Ventana BenchMark or Dako Autostainer), microtome, water bath, slide warmer, light microscope, timer
